title: How to Get Super Saiyan God in Dragon Ball Xenoverse 2: Step-by-Step

steps.title: Obtain the 7 Dragon Balls.
steps.content: Obtain the 7 Dragon Balls. You can get Dragon Balls by defeating Time Patrollers in Parallel Quests (PQs). [1] X Research source The most popular PQs for farming Dragon Balls are PQ 4, 7, 19, 23, 34, and 79. This is due to how quickly you can fight a Time Patroller or having an overall low completion time. The exception is PQ 79, which has two Time Patrollers which increases your overall changes for getting a Dragon Ball. It's best to switch between multiple PQs for farming Dragon Balls, as once you get a Dragon Ball from a PQ it's less likely to drop another one. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Summon Shenron at the Dragon Ball Pedestal.
steps.content: Summon Shenron at the Dragon Ball Pedestal. Once you have all 7 Dragon Balls, summon Shenron at the Dragon Ball Pedestal in Conton City. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Wish to become a Super Saiyan God.
steps.content: Wish to become a Super Saiyan God. Select the last option on the list, which says I want to become a Super Saiyan God! . At this point, the game will let you know that you need to befriend five instructors: Goku, Vegeta, Gohan & Videl, Gotenks, and Pan. These mentors are unlocked after doing the following: Goku: Defeat Final Form Mira in the story Vegeta: Progress the story past the fight with Frieza Gohan & Videl: Pass the Buu saga Gotenks: Pass the Buu saga Pan: Complete "Time to Train - Whis's Whimsy" and pass the God Class Advancement Test

steps.title: Max out your friendships with Goku, Vegeta, Gohan & Videl, Gotenks, and Pan.
steps.content: Max out your friendships with Goku, Vegeta, Gohan & Videl, Gotenks, and Pan. If you've already maxed out these friendships, you can skip to the next step. If you have not, the fastest way to max these friendships is to: Go to the Tokipedia in the Time Nest. You'll need the Extra Pack 2 DLC to access the Tokipedia. Repeat the quest "The Hero Tapion Awakens." Make sure you select the instructor you're trying to max out as your mentor and your partner for the quest. It'll take about 6 runs of this quest to max out a friendship that started at 0%.

steps.title: Talk to Beerus on the roof of Orange Star High School.
steps.content: Talk to Beerus on the roof of Orange Star High School. Beerus will give you the Super Saiyan God transformation once you've completed maxing out friendship with Goku, Vegeta, Gohan & Videl, Gotenks, and Pan. [4] X Research source
